DESCRIPTION: If you are in a #yStance, trigger its Technique bonus.
Extra effect when played in the listed #yStance.
After playing a Finisher, if you are in a #yStance, exit it, trigger its Finisher bonus, and end your turn.
The next time you take #yAttack damage, deal damage back.
You have #b1 #yStrength for every #b5 Resolve. At the end of combat, heal HP equal to your Resolve.
#yStance. #yTechnique: #yFatigue #y3. #yFinisher: Lose all your #yResolve and gain that much HP, preserving #yStrength. End your turn.
#yStance. #yTechnique: Draw #b1 card. #yFinisher: Next turn, draw #b1 card and gain [E] . End your turn.
#yStance. Counts as all #b3 #yStances. Finishers do not end your turn or exit the Stance. You can't change to any other #yStance.
Lose HP and gain an equal amount of #yResolve.
